comments.comment: You failed to mention the Databricks ML version?
There seems to be a problem with ML 6.x as it uses cluster-mode. Could you please try ML 5.x?
Running it on ML 5.x worked. So is the a bug on all spark sessions running in cluster-mode and not client-mode?

I have observed that YARN cluster-mode has this issue. But I am not sure if ML 6.x problem is related to this or something else. I canâ€™t find anything about ML 6.x that says they are using cluster-mode.
This has been resolved in 2.4.5 release: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/JohnSnowLabs/spark-nlp/releases/tag/2.4.5>https://github.com/JohnSnowLabs/spark-nlp/releases/tag/2.4.5</denchmark-link>
